nodes.text: The Perlemian Haul was the codename of a rumored Imperial convoy operating along the Perlemian Trade Route. The convoy included Temple-class heavy freighters and two Star Galleon-class frigates. Shortly after the Battle of Yavin, the Rebel Alliance confirmed its existence and sent a team of operatives to secure its mysterious cargo. They infiltrated freighter M226.
The convoy appears in the roleplaying game adventure Perlemian Haul, included with Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook.
